import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import "magnific-popup"; import $ from "jquery"; const TopRatedMovies2 = () => { const [items, setItems] = useState(Menu); const filterItem = (categItem)=>{ const updateItems = Menu.filter((curElem)=>{ return curElem.category === categItem; }) setItems(updateItems); } return (

Upcoming Matches

ONLINE STREAMING

Upcoming Movies

{ items.map((elem)=>{ const {id,image,title,date,quality,duration,ratings} = elem; return(
{title}
{date}
  • {quality}
  • {duration} {ratings}
) }) }
BROWSE ALL MOVIES
) } export default TopRatedMovies2
